Name.Name: Maximus
Name.BackStory: their life is dominated by solving the murder of his half brother. He was poisoned years ago and the killer was never brought to justice.

Name.Name: Cicero
Name.BackStory: His biggest fear is his friends discovering that he can't speak.

Name.Name: Bob
Name.BackStory: Lives his life like his goal is to end up face-down in a ditch.

Name.Name: Tiberius
Name.BackStory: Ended up with little money due to poor economic circumstances.

Name.Name: Agrippa
Name.BackStory: His father left when he was young, leaving him with his mother, who was addicted to Cretic Wine.

Name.Name: Numerius
Name.BackStory: A former politician who has fallen on hard times after a crippling addiction to Blue Lotus. After a huge bender, he woke up with his pants on his head floating down the river.

Company.Name: Ludus Gallicus
Company.BackStory: An ancient school that has run into hard times as of late.
Company.Motto: If you know the enemy and know yourself you need not fear the results of a hundred battles.

Company.Name: Ludus Magnus
Company.BackStory: An ancient school that has run into hard times as of late.
Company.Motto: You must not fight too often with one enemy, or you will teach him all your art of war.

Company.Name: Ludus Dacicus
Company.BackStory: An ancient school that has run into hard times as of late.
Company.Motto: Take every cheap shot, every low blow, absolutely kick people when they're down, and maybe you'll be the one who walks away.

Company.Name: Ludus Matutinus
Company.BackStory: An ancient school that has run into hard times as of late.

Company.Name: Fel Anguis Animus
Company.BackStory: An ancient school that has run into hard times as of late.
Company.Motto: Pulsa Primum - Pulsa Dure - Nulla Clementia

Fight.Name: Fight of the Dregs
Fight.Description: Take whatever wretches you just grabbed off the street, and chuck em in the Colliseum. Its a slow day.

Fight.Name: Fight of the Veterans
Fight.Description: Theres a lot of retired soldiers that need something to do. Gladii only.

Fight.Name: Fight of the Underdog
Fight.Description: You need someone truly legendary to win against these odds.

Skill.Name: Bladed Weapon
Skill.Description: How effective a character is at stabbing things

Skill.Name: Thrown Weapon
Skill.Description: How good a character is at throwing things

Skill.Name: Light Armor
Skill.Description: How effective a character is at fighting in light armor

Skill.Name: Heavy Armor
Skill.Description: How effective a character is at fighting in heavy armor

Skill.Name: Counterattack
Skill.Description: A characters skill in counterattacking after being attacked.

Skill.Name: Unarmed Fighting
Skill.Description: A characters skill in fighting without a weapon
